review: I bought the fire stick for the sole purpose of watching Sling TV, so I have not used it for any other purpose. The device is very slow, very laggy. If you're trying to change "channels," you're current video stream becomes very jittery, and the sound begins to cut out. The Sling App on my iPad and iPhone both work with no hesitation, so I'm inclined to say the Stick just isn't up to the job of streaming Sling.

review: When this thing works, it's great...problem is it never wants to work. Nothing but issue after issue. It continuously looses its connection. I reset, I unplug, I do everything under the sun and occasionally something works but more times then not it just crashes again. Then most times when I reset it, it doesn't want to accept my Amazon password. Then when it finally does, it just leads to another issue. Right now it states "no network connection". My laptop, my Kindle, my phone, all connected-but not the stick. I give up.
author: Roscoe S Cromwell
